TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SKFrontBufferedManagedStream extends SkiaSharp.SKAbstractManagedStream

Docs.summary: A read-only stream that buffers the specified first chunk of bytes.
Docs.remarks: This is useful for decoding images using streams that are not seekable, since needs to read the first few bytes to determine the codec to use.

Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to seek to a relative offset.
Docs.returns: Returns if seeking is supported and the seek was successful, otherwise .
Docs.remarks: If an attempt is made to move to a position outside the stream, the position must be set to the closest point within the stream (beginning or end).

Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to copy the specified number of bytes into the specified buffer.
Docs.returns: Returns the number of bytes actually peeked/copied.
Docs.remarks: The stream’s cursor must be returned to the position before this method was called.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool OnSeek (IntPtr position);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool OnSeek(native int position) cil managed

Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to seek to an absolute position.
Docs.returns: Returns if seeking is supported and the seek was successful, otherwise .
Docs.remarks: If an attempt is made to move to a position outside the stream, the position must be set to the closest point within the stream (beginning or end).
